articles.title: Apple SPI Touchpad not recognized in input devices
articles.text:
I'm running Ubuntu 20.04 LTS on a 2019 Macbook pro and the touchpad occasionally stops working after sleep or shutdown/restart. Updating software and restarting sometimes fixes the issue but not always. When it does work I see the following from:

less /proc/…

articles.title: Internal iOS 13.5.5 Code Indicates ‘Apple Bundle’ for Subscription Services in the Works
articles.text: Apple released the first developer beta of iOS 13.5.5 to the public earlier this year. The developer beta did not bring any major changes or improvements. However, the internal code found in iOS 13.5.5 makes references to an “Apple bundle” i.e. a subscription…
articles.author: Rajesh Pandey

articles.title: Code in iOS 13.5.5 shows Apple is working on a services bundle
articles.text:
Apple continues to slowly push towards a services bundle.

What you need to know


Apple is still working on a services bundle.
Code found within iOS 13.5.5 makes reference to such an offering.
Apple has been rumored to be working on a bundle for years.


App…

articles.title: Apple hires Amazon Video executive James DeLorenzo to lead sports division on Apple TV
articles.text: Apple continues to hire professionals to improve its TV service. The company has now hired executive James DeLorenzo, who has led Amazon Video’s sports division since 2016. He was also Senior Vice President of Audible, Inc., an Amazon company focused on audio…

articles.title: Massive EOFY sale launches on Kogan - with prices slashed on Apple, high-end items, TVs and laptops
articles.text: Australian online retailer Kogan has launched a massive end of financial year sale, with prices slashed by up to 69 per cent across Apple gadgets,  high-end sneakers, TVs and laptops.

articles.title: Apple still mulling services bundle, iOS 13.5.5 code suggests
articles.text: Code discovered in the latest iOS 13.5.5 release suggests Apple is mulling a bundling of its core for-pay services, Apple Music, Apple News+ and Apple TV+, according to a report on Wednesday.
articles.author: news@appleinsider.com (Mikey Campbell)
